attributes.action: Convicted Manchester rioters should loose all benefits.
attributes.additional_details:
Any persons convicted of criminal acts during the current Manchester riots should have all financial benefits removed. No tax payer should have to contribute to those who have destroyed property, stolen from their community and shown a disregard for the country that provides for them.

Bring justice back to our country.

These low life "Chavs" must learn by having no monatary support from the goverment and their country and by a harsh imprisonment sentance. Let them rot in jail, there is no place for them in the world!
